name: trop-kick
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on
the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on
the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.
